cells.name: Consul Agent – Number of Go Routines

queries.query: SELECT max("value") AS "Go Routines" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."consul_ip-172-31-6-247_runtime_num_goroutines" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT max("value") AS "Runtime Alloc Bytes" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."consul_ip-172-31-6-247_runtime_alloc_bytes" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT max("value") AS "Heap Objects" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."consul_ip-172-31-6-247_runtime_heap_objects" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT min("value") AS "num_agents" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."consul_memberlist_msg_alive" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: count

queries.query: SELECT max("value") AS "max_value" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."consul_raft_state_candidate" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: count

queries.query: SELECT max("upper") AS "GET_health_state" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."consul_consul_http_GET_v1_health_state__" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: ms

queries.query: SELECT max("value") as "change" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."consul_raft_state_leader" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: count

queries.query: SELECT max("value") AS "serf_events" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."consul_serf_events" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: count
